text: Rhodopetoma is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Rhodopetoma include: * Rhodopetoma diaulax (Dall, 1908) * Rhodopetoma erosa (Schrenck, 1862) * Rhodopetoma renaudi (Arnold, 1903) ;Species brought into synonymy: * Rhodopetoma akkeshiensis Habe, 1958: synonym of Ophiodermella akkeshiensis (Habe, 1958) * Rhodopetoma rhodope (Dall, 1919): synonym of Rhodopetoma diaulax (Dall, 1908) ==References== ==External links== * Bartsch, P, Some turrid mollusks of Monterey Bay and vinicity; Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington, v. 57 p. 57-68 * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 * Worldwide Mollusc Species Data Base: Pseudomelatomidae Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Rhodopetoma
